comments.en:
The ImageWriter II is a four-color dot matrix printer from Apple. Optionally can be driven using AppleTalk/PAP with an option add-on card, LocalTalk card or bridge to Linux machine, kernel AppleTalk support, and netatalk.

Consumables/Refills: Black Ribbon, $5.15 (Staples.com), Four-Color Ribbon, $11.95, Pr
